body_html:
I had similar problems until I realized that the summary writer did not actually write the file unless I called the summary writer's flush() function.

I'm not sure, but it's probably because I had the summary writer's code snippet in a code part that did not close (and the code finished before the standard 120 seconds between each automatic flush).
body_text:
I had similar problems until I realized that the summary writer did not actually write the file unless I called the summary writer's flush() function.
I'm not sure, but it's probably because I had the summary writer's code snippet in a code part that did not close (and the code finished before the standard 120 seconds between each automatic flush).
body:
I had similar problems until I realized that the summary writer did not actually write the file unless I called the summary writer's flush() function.

I'm not sure, but it's probably because I had the summary writer's code snippet in a code part that did not close (and the code finished before the standard 120 seconds between each automatic flush).
